channel.title: Startup on Pranjal's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Startup on Pranjal's Blog

item.title: Beyond the AI Gold Rush
item.description: ⚡ TL;DR We replaced expensive third-party AI APIs with self-hosted ML models to solve privacy concerns, unpredictable costs, and lack of control in our kids' chat platform—proving that the shiniest AI solution isn't always the smartest business decision

item.title: Seamless Auth System Migration with Supertokens
item.description: ⚡ TL;DR A step-by-step guide to seamlessly migrating 5000+ active users from an admin-secret auth system to SuperTokens without any downtime or user disruption, using a clever dual-version deployment strategy with token pre-generation.
